update item_source set TITLE = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TYPE = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SOURCE_ID = #{sourceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SOURCE_DETAIL_URL = #{sourceDetailUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ITEM_ID = #{itemId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SALE_STATUS = #{saleStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRICE = #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PURCHASE_PRICE = #{purchasePrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PURCHASE_DISCOUNT_PRICE = #{purchaseDiscountPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PROFIT = #{profit,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SHOP_ID = #{shopId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, END_DATE = #{endDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, IMG = #{img,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SOURCE_OWNER = #{sourceOwner,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MY_TOTAL_SOLD_QUANTITY = #{myTotalSoldQuantity,jdbcType=BIGINT}, SOURCE_TOTAL_SOLD_QUANTITY = #{sourceTotalSoldQuantity,jdbcType=BIGINT}, LAST_NOTICE_DAY = #{lastNoticeDay,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from item_source
order by ${orderByClause}
SELECT item_source.* FROM item_source INNER JOIN blacklist ON item_source.TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%',blacklist.word,'%') WHERE item_source.sale_status!='下架'

SELECT item_source.* FROM item_source INNER JOIN source_blacklist ON item_source.TYPE = source_blacklist.TYPE AND source_blacklist.SOURCE_OWNER = item_source.SOURCE_OWNER WHERE item_source.sale_status!='下架'
